Test.name: Behaviour Block with timeout stress test
Test.WhatTest: Tests the behaviour block/restart mechanism when a timeout is specified by stressing it.
Test.HowWorkTest: It should be noticed that passing this test does not ensure the mechanism works correctly, this test will take a while.
Test.WhenTestPass: The test passes if no exception is fired.

Test.name: Threaded behaviours
Test.WhatTest: Tests the mechanism provided by JADE to execute a behaviour in a separated Java Thread.
Test.HowWorkTest: The test creates a ThreadedBehaviour that calls blockingReceive(), block() and block(timeout).
Test.WhenTestPass: The test passes if the ThreadedBehaviour correctly receives all the expected messages.

Test.name: Behaviour performance
Test.WhatTest: Tests the performance of the behaviour scheduling/blocking/restarting mechanism by running a number of different behaviours that do all these things.
Test.HowWorkTest: The complete process is repeated several times and the average time is computed.
Test.WhenTestPass: The test passes if no exception is fired.
